review: I wanted a way to watch Youtube, Netflix, Hulu plus, etc from my MBA without a long cable running across the room.  The Google Chromecast HDMI Streaming Media Player is the way to go. Order, receive, open box & plug into TV (USB) and power. After simple online setup, the last step is to enjoy.I have found that visiting  children no longer fight over the iPad. The spend more time watching their favorite youtube shows.I showed a 5 year old how to set up the cast and how to select shows, now it's a virtual babysitter.It can be moved from room to room, id necessary, or brought to a friend's house.It's up there with sliced bread.

review: Waste of money. Only works by tying up another device, like a tablet or a phone. Limited capabilities as to streaming. Spend $5 bucks more and buy an MK808 Google TV device instead. The MK808 is basically a tablet sans screen and turns your TV into a massive tablet. I stream everything from my network server, XBMC compatible, play games, and can expand memory with MicroSD memory. Check eBay for the latest pricing.
